title: (x) The great paper caper - Century Gothic, Trade Gothic Bold Oblique {Lex, Justin}
content:
Can anyone ID the font of the title of this book?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130628020810im_/http:/typophile.com/files/great-paper-caper_4849.jpg)
author: Flynner

comments.content:
Yep, think that's it. Cheers!

What about the authors name, would you know that one?

That looks like [Trade Gothic LTStd Bold Oblique](http://web.archive.org/web/20130628020810/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/trade-gothic/bold-obl/)  
What edition of the book is this? It's a shame they haven't used Oliver's own hand-lettering that is on the UK one.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130628020810im_/http:/typophile.com/files/9780007182336_6161.jpg)

Some edubureaucrat probably said it would confuse kids.

hhp
